ayas.translation: Perish the hands of Abu Lahab, and perish he!

bismillah.translation: In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.

ayas.arabic: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
ayas.translation: Neither his wealth availed him, nor what he had earned.
ayas.transliteration: mā aghnā `anhu māluhu wa mā kasab

ayas.translation: Soon he will enter the blazing fire,
and his wife [too], the firewood carrier,
with a rope of palm fibre around her neck.
